function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Infrequent cleaning and lack of contactless technologies in residential spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of user participation in decision-making regarding housing issues","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate user participation in the design process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for societal changes and future challenges in the design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inflow of rural population into urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated industrialization and urban population increase","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Grounding housing fund construction on socialist principles","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from self-managing socialism to neoliberal capitalism","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privatization of spatial and economic resources","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anarchy in transitional period","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting a survey and collecting data from 170 individual respondents during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gathering data on the quality of everyday life during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey includes a mix of urban and suburban residents, potentially representing different levels of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Respondents aged 19 to 70 years were included in the survey, potentially encompassing different susceptibility to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survey examines advantages and disadvantages of living in apartments and houses during the pandemic, potentially uncovering environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in current residential buildings to current and future pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey revealing key shortcomings of current housing conditions in the context of covid-19 restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Majority of respondents worked or studied from home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Struggle to organize adequate work/study space in living environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of vacation properties for work/study during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of contact with nature in residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Feeling of being trapped in an apartment during curfew","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impossibility of self-isolation in common areas of the building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respondents spending more time in nature or planning to do so","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent weekend \"out of town\" trips recorded by respondents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decision to buy land for agricultural purposes and real estate outside the city","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents seeking personalized adaptation of apartments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preference for living in houses over apartments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistically significant predictors of satisfaction with living in apartments during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Living in an apartment during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate working environment within living space","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of contact with nature and outdoor space during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to self-isolate in common areas of the building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient state policies related to housing strategies in response to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate lighting and ventilation in residential environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation leading to risks of anxiety, depression, and premature mortality","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in apartment layout for functional reorganization during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate open and closed spaces for gatherings and social interaction","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creating open and closed spaces for gatherings within a building","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bringing nature into every apartment unit","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Activation of inner yards for social activities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and open spaces in multi-family residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited space for remote work and social activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lower attractiveness of multi-apartment buildings compared to single-family buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased satisfaction with the immediate living environment due to changes in spatial needs of occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited options for reorganizing living space in small apartments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of contact with nature as a drawback of pandemic restrictions on leaving the residence.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper maintenance of green areas leading to the spread of contagious diseases such as vector-borne illnesses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper sanitation in urban agriculture spaces leading to contamination and spread of foodborne illnesses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation and air quality in multi-family residential buildings with green spaces leading to airborne disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
